displayProperties.name: Perpetual Motion
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chance of finding Special ammo while you have a Sidearm equipped that uses Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Artifice Armor
displayProperties.description: Bonus socket for artifact mods.

displayProperties.name: Duelist's Trance
displayProperties.description: Sword final blows grant increased charge rate, efficiency, and defense until this weapon is stowed.

displayProperties.name: Pinpoint Slug Frame
displayProperties.description: Fires a single slug round.

displayProperties.name: UNLOCKED BY QUEST
displayProperties.description:
ASPECT OF INFLUENCE
Unlock this Stasis Aspect by completing the quests "Aspect of Destruction" and "Aspect of Influence," acquired from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Sidearms that use Special ammo get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Compounding Force
displayProperties.description: Fires slugs that cause massive damage to enemy shields. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Eager Edge
displayProperties.description: Gain increased Sword lunge distance immediately after switching to this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Crystalline Transistor
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows from non-elemental Kinetic weapons create an explosion in the element of your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Legacy PR-55 Frame
displayProperties.description: Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.

displayProperties.name: Pace Yourself
displayProperties.description: Tapping the trigger gives this weapon less recoil and improves accuracy.

displayProperties.name: Full Auto Retrofit
displayProperties.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

displayProperties.name: UNLOCKED BY QUEST
displayProperties.description:
ASPECT OF CONTROL
Unlock this Stasis Aspect by completing the quests "Born in Darkness Part 1" and "Aspect of Control," acquired from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

displayProperties.name: UNLOCKED BY QUEST
displayProperties.description:
ASPECT OF DESTRUCTION
Unlock this Stasis Aspect by completing the quests "Born in Darkness Part 4" and "Aspect of Destruction," acquired from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

displayProperties.name: The Rock
displayProperties.description: For several seconds after a final blow, [Alternate Weapon Action]  to consume part of your ammo reserves, converting your next thrown grenade into a fragmentation grenade.

displayProperties.name: Pack Hunter
displayProperties.description: Gain increased handling and reload speed when standing near allies. Firing this weapon also grants Wolfpack Rounds to nearby allies wielding non-Exotic Rocket Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Paraversal Singularity
displayProperties.description: Adds a singularity appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Cellular Division
displayProperties.description: Adds a cellular appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Sweaty Confetti
displayProperties.description:
Causes a festive celebration on each precision final blow.

This cosmetic mod is consumed when inserted into a weapon.

displayProperties.name: Winter's Wrath
displayProperties.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[Super Primary]  : Cast out a barrage of [Stasis] Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[Super Secondary]  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.

displayProperties.name: LN2 Burst
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap fire mode.

displayProperties.name: Quick Access Sling
displayProperties.description: Increases this weapon's ready and stow speed.

displayProperties.name: Cold Steel
displayProperties.description: Powered Sword hits slow targets.

displayProperties.name: Piled High
displayProperties.description: Adds a gift pile appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: UNLOCKED BY QUEST
displayProperties.description:
ASPECT OF INTERFERENCE
Unlock this Stasis Aspect by completing the quests "Aspect of Influence" and "Aspect of Interference," acquired from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

displayProperties.name: UNLOCKED BY QUEST
displayProperties.description: After owning at least 1 Stasis Aspect, unlock this Fragment by exchanging a Memory Fragment with the Exo Stranger on Europa. Earn Memory Fragments through completing the Exo Stranger's Fragment Quests.

displayProperties.name: Golden Tricorn
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. While this buff is active, grenade or melee kills of the same damage type greatly increase its damage and duration.

displayProperties.name: Wolfpack Rounds
displayProperties.description: Creates tracking cluster missiles on impact.

displayProperties.name: Full Stop
displayProperties.description: Deals massively increased precision damage to unshielded targets.

displayProperties.name: Pinpoint Slug Frame
displayProperties.description: Fires a single-slug round.

displayProperties.name: Pulse Monitor
displayProperties.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.

displayProperties.name: Liquid Cooling
displayProperties.description: Direct hits by a Charged Shot instantly freeze the target. Indirect hits freeze combatants and slow enemy Guardians.

displayProperties.name: Nova Warp
displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

displayProperties.name: Blunt Execution Rounds
displayProperties.description: Damaging nearby combatants with melee abilities dramatically increases handling and damage. Expires after a short duration or the next shot.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Sidearms that use Special ammo get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Thin the Herd
displayProperties.description: Direct hits do more damage to enemy combatant shields. Dealing damage increases reload speed. Rapid kills against grenade-damaged enemies refill the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Adrenaline Junkie
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from grenade kills and kills with this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Boon of Friendship
displayProperties.description:
Grants a Dawning reward to your fireteam upon completion of a playlist activity, with additional rewards based on the number of players with Boons active.

Effect lasts until a reward is earned. Only one Boon of Friendship may be active per player.

displayProperties.name: More Wolves
displayProperties.description: Increases magazine size. Final blows with Wolfpack Rounds spawn a faster, more powerful missile at the target's location.
